articles.content: The ISSF World Championships are starting on August 14 in Baku, Azerbaijan. A 22-member Indian squad, comprising rifle and pistol shooters, will eye securing Olympic quotas and fine-tuning their perf… [+3302 chars]

articles.title: Entire Plane, Barring One Fan, Celebrates As Australia Qualify For Women's FIFA World Cup Semis. Wat.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Australia defeated France on penalties to qualify for the Women's FIFA World Cup semi-final where they will face England.
articles.content: As the FIFA Women's World Cup nears its decisive stage, the craze for the tournament has soared to an absolute peak, especially in Australia who are the co-hosts for the tournament. With the Australi… [+1758 chars]

articles.author: Vaishnawi Sinha
articles.title: Indian cricketers who have highest social media post fees - DNA India
articles.description: From MS Dhoni to Virat Kohli, here is the social media post fees of top Indian cricketers.
articles.content: Though not Indian, AB De Villiers is one of the highest-charging cricketers on social media, with Rs 58 lakh per post fee.
